entry.data:
PATCHY DENSE FOG THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
